module.name: Blacklist
module.description: This module is used to manage a system wide list of blocked callers
module.changelog: *15.0.4* FREEPBX-23789 Removed case sensitive check. *15.0.3* FREEI-3783 Blocklist for inbound SMS/MMS *15.0.2.20* FREEI-4665 and FREEI-4838 - Fixing GQL APis *15.0.2.19* FREEI-4665 *15.0.2.18* FREEI-4665 Fixed blacklist bugs and added new api to set blacklist settings *15.0.2.17* FREEPBX-23086: Add i18n detection to phrases that are not detected *15.0.2.16* FREEPBX-22989 - Call Log in BlackList show date duplicate *15.0.2.15* REEI-3374 Vuln-001 Stored Cross-Site Scripting *15.0.2.14* FREEI-3281 *15.0.2.13* FREEI-2935-Blacklist-GUI-Issue *15.0.2.12* Packaging of ver 15.0.2.12 *15.0.2.11* Packaging of ver 15.0.2.11 *15.0.2.10* FREEI-890 Fix XSS Bootstrap Datatable Issues *15.0.2.9* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.2.8* FREEPBX-20389 Restoring backup into FreePBX 15 system is not flushing the previously existing blacklist entries. *15.0.2.7* fixing backup *15.0.2.6* fixing legacy restore *15.0.2.5* fixing legacy restore *15.0.2.4* FREEPBX-18905 Blacklist not working *15.0.2.3* FREEPBX-18905 Blacklist not working *15.0.2.2* FREEPBX-18352 Hook namespace issue *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Forked from 13.0.14.9 Implement Backup 15
